name: Small Health Potion
description: Restores a small amount of health.

name: Medium Health Potion
description: Restores a moderate amount of health.

name: Large Health Potion
description: Restores a large amount of health.

name: Elixir of Life
description: Fully restores health.

name: Mega Health Potion
description: Restores a massive amount of health.

name: Ultimate Health Potion
description: Maximizes the player's health.

name: Mystic Elixir
description: Heals all wounds and grants extra health.

name: Herbal Tonic
description: A restorative potion made from rare herbs.

name: Phoenix Feather Elixir
description: Grants the drinker the vitality of a phoenix.

name: Dragon's Blood Potion
description: Restores a significant amount of health.

name: Vampire's Draught
description: Absorbs life from enemies and restores health.

name: Healing Waters
description: A rare potion made from enchanted spring water.

name: Spirit Elixir
description: Restores health and cleanses negative effects.

name: Potion of Rejuvenation
description: Rejuvenates the body, restoring a large amount of health.

name: Elixir of Vitality
description: Boosts health and stamina.

name: Small Aura Potion
description: Increases aura by a small amount.

name: Medium Aura Potion
description: Increases aura by a moderate amount.

name: Large Aura Potion
description: Increases aura by a large amount.

name: Elixir of Radiance
description: A powerful potion that boosts aura significantly.

name: Mystic Aura Potion
description: Increases aura and enhances mystical abilities.

name: Potion of Enlightenment
description: Boosts the drinker's aura to a higher state.

name: Ancient Aura Potion
description: Grants the power of ancient auras.

name: Celestial Aura Potion
description: Blesses the drinker with celestial aura.

name: Divine Essence
description: A potion made from divine energy, greatly enhancing aura.

name: Potion of Clarity
description: Enhances aura and mental focus.

name: Elixir of the Ancients
description: Boosts aura with the wisdom of the ancients.

name: Phantom Elixir
description: Enhances aura with a mysterious, ghostly power.

name: Starlight Potion
description: Increases aura with the power of the stars.

name: Elixir of Shadows
description: Increases aura and grants stealthy abilities.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A sharp dagger made of silver.

name: Fire Staff
description: A staff imbued with the power of fire.

name: Lightning Bow
description: A bow that shoots electrified arrows.

name: Ice Wand
description: A wand that casts freezing spells.

name: Shadow Blade
description: A blade that strikes with the power of shadows.

name: Thunder Hammer
description: A hammer that calls down thunder upon impact.

name: Poisoned Dagger
description: A dagger coated with a deadly poison.

name: War Axe
description: A heavy axe designed for battle.

name: Holy Sword
description: A sword blessed with divine power.

name: Crystal Spear
description: A spear made of pure crystal, sharp and powerful.

name: Flame Bow
description: A bow that shoots flaming arrows.

name: Meteor Sword
description: A sword forged from a fallen meteor, infused with cosmic energy.

name: Dark Scythe
description: A scythe that harvests the souls of its enemies.

name: Frost Hammer
description: A hammer that freezes anything it strikes.

name: Vampire's Fang
description: A blade that drains the life force of enemies.

name: Dragon's Claw
description: A claw-shaped weapon imbued with dragon's fire.

name: Gale Bow
description: A bow that fires arrows with the force of a gale.

name: Rune Axe
description: An axe inscribed with powerful runes.

name: Blazing Mace
description: A mace engulfed in eternal flames.

name: Storm Blade
description: A sword that crackles with lightning.

name: Venomous Whip
description: A whip laced with potent venom.

name: Crystal Flail
description: A flail with a head made of sharp crystal shards.

name: Solar Sword
description: A sword that radiates the power of the sun.
